mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (TITLE, CONTENT, CATEGORY, MEMBERID, RENTNO, CAMPNO) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{memberId}, #{rentNo}, #{campNo})
